title: UEFA ( Union of European Football Associations ) total revenue 2004 to 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Revenue of the UEFA from the 2004/05 season to the 2017/18 season .

According to Deloitte , in the 2017/18 season the Revenue of the Spanish football club increased by 22 million , to 4579.8 million euros , with record matchday and commercial Revenue for a football club .
UEFA - additional information UEFA 's brand and team value grew significantly in 2014 , thanks in part to the high-profile signing of Luis Suarez from Liverpool UEFA in 2014 .
gold: This statistic shows the total revenue of the UEFA from the 2004/05 season to the 2017/18 season . The season runs from July 1 to June 30 of the following year . The revenue of the 2017/18 season was 2.79 billion euros .
